fields.name: continuationMethod
fields.description: The name of the callback method that is called after the callout response returns.

fields.name: timeout
fields.description: The timeout of the continuation in seconds. Maximum: 120 seconds seconds.

fields.name: state
fields.description: Data that is stored in this continuation and that can be retrieved after the callout is finished and the callback method is invoked.

constuctors.name: Continuation
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the Continuation class by using the specified timeout in seconds. The timeout maximum is 120 seconds.

methods.name: addHttpRequest
methods.description: Adds the HTTP request for the callout that is associated with this continuation.

methods.name: getRequests
methods.description: Returns all labels and requests that are associated with this continuation as key-value pairs.

methods.name: getResponse
methods.description: Returns the response for the request that corresponds to the specified label.
